name: "20 Hours in America 1 & 2" Trivia Game | 'West Wing' - Season 4 | 15 Questions

questions.text: Which three White House staffers got left in Indiana?
questions.explanation:
Josh, Toby and Donna.

	This incident made for several comments throughout the next few episodes of the season.

questions.text: What kind of vehicle broke down trying to get the three to a gas station?
questions.explanation:
diesel truck.

	Josh: "This is fun. We're roughing it. This is fun."

questions.text: Who did Josh call so someone could take over his job while he was gone?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam's answering machine: "Just yell really loud and I'll probably wake up." Josh (over answering machine): "Sa-a-a-a-am!"Sam broke a lamp when he jumped out of bed.

questions.text: Who talked to Toby over his cell phone thinking he and Josh were somewhere in the White House?
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	Toby (to Josh): "She'd like us to stop by her office."

questions.text: What college did the man tell Josh and Toby he and his daughter were visiting?
How many of the First Lady's children did CJ say she loved?
questions.explanation:
two.

	CJ: "The First Lady loves two out of three of her children but she won't tell them which one."

questions.text: How many modes of transportation did Donna say helped them get to where they were?
How did the last group of people that got left by the motorcade get back to Washington D.C.?
questions.explanation:
cab.

	Donna: "It was Tennessee and they were never heard from again." Josh: "They took a cab."

questions.text: After Charlie turned her down, who was the second person that CJ asked to be Anthony's big brother?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam: "I could narrate what I was doing for him. 'Right now, I'm reading background intelligence on Central America as it relates - believe it or not - to textile imports.' Ooh! Intelligence... 007! See, and right away I've got him going with 007." CJ: "I'm sitting here listening; already, I've turned to a life of crime."

questions.text: What did CJ give Charlie to put on his desk?
questions.correct: picture of him and his mom
questions.explanation:
picture of him and his mom.

	Charlie's sister, Deanna, gave it to CJ to have framed so Charlie could have it on his desk.

questions.text: Why did Josh yell, "What kind of world are we living in?"
questions.correct: they missed Air Force One due to time zone changes
options: the diner was out of dry rub
no one knew they were missing
questions.explanation:
they missed Air Force One due to time zone changes.

	After finding out they missed the plane, Toby picked up a stick and started beating the guard rail with it while Josh walked through a bridge ranting and raving about the world.

questions.text: How many IQ points did the President say Josh and Toby had between them?
questions.explanation:
300.

	Bartlet: "Three hundred IQ points between them and they can't find their way home. I swear if Donna wasn't there, they would have to buy a house."

questions.text: What nickname did Nancy call Admiral Fitzwallace?
What did Margaret call Leo's cooking show?
Toby, Donna and Josh walked across the bridge into Washington D.C. to end the two parter episode.
questions.explanation:
True.

	They got off the bus and walked into the city.
